name: py-xanadu-cloud-client

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
The Xanadu Cloud Client (XCC) is a Python API and CLI for the Xanadu
Cloud.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-appdirs
dependencies.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir".

dependencies.name: py-fire
dependencies.description:
Python Fire is a library for automatically generating command line
interfaces (CLIs) with a single line of code.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pydantic
dependencies.description: Data validation and settings management using Python type hinting.

dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil
dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependent_to.name: py-strawberryfields
dependent_to.description: Open source library for continuous-variable quantum computation
